# Radio button

Radio buttons allow users to select one option from a set

# Basic usage

In usual case, you should use m-radio-group and m-radio inside. Because, this combination, provide you single-select principleopen in new window out of the box.

Radio button basic example

dark_modecode
<m-radio-group selected="option1">
<m-radio-button value="option1">
<template #label>
This is item 1
</template>
</m-radio-button>
<m-radio-button value="option2">
<template #label>
This is item 2
</template>
</m-radio-button>
</m-radio-group>

radio_button_checked

This is item 1

radio_button_unchecked

This is item 2

# Changing state

Change state using radio refs

dark_modecode

Apple!

radio_button_unchecked

Apple

radio_button_checked

Orange

Change state using radio group refs

dark_modecode

Yeeeah!

radio_button_unchecked

Yes

radio_button_unchecked

Nope

# Examples

Choose option with reset

dark_modecode

Reset

radio_button_unchecked

Green

radio_button_unchecked

Violet
